sentences.sContent: Adam’s smile sent her spirits soaring .
sentences.sCn: 亚当的微笑让她飘飘然了。

remMethod.val: “烧” → 发烧了， 体温猛增 → 猛增， 剧增

words.tran: 高耸（soar的现在分词形式）；高飞；猛增

trans.tranOther: if your  spirits (= the way you are feeling, for example happy, sad etc )  or hopes soar, you begin to feel very happy or hopeful
